mapper.select: SELECT e.name AS engineerName, e.age AS engineerAge, e.address AS engineerAddress, e.phone_number AS engineerPhoneNumber, s.language AS skillLanguage, es.years_of_experience AS skillYearsOfExperience, pr.project_name AS projectName, ep.start_date AS projectStartDate, ep.end_date AS projectEndDate FROM engineers e INNER JOIN engineers_skills_sets es ON e.id = es.engineer_id INNER JOIN skills s ON s.id = es.skill_id INNER JOIN engineers_projects_participation ep ON ep.engineer_id = e.id INNER JOIN projects pr ON pr.id = ep.project_id WHERE e.id = #{id}
